resources.string: In this Activity i get data from the server using retrofit and show them in the recyclerView
In this Activity i showed the movieList data in the recyclerView with onclick and onLongClick feature(using basic way)

In this Activity i showed the movieList data in the recyclerView with onClick and onLongClick feature(using interface) and also swap left to delete the item and swap right to archive the item and also drag and drop the list item in the recyclerView and also the search the list item in side the recyclerView but unfortunately searching is not working.
